articles.author: Adele Ankers-Range
articles.title: Pierce Brosnan Says Cillian Murphy Would Make a 'Magnificent' James Bond - IGN
articles.description: Former James Bond actor Pierce Brosnan thinks Oppenheimer star Cillian Murphy would "do a magnificent job" playing 007.
articles.content:
Former James Bond actor Pierce Brosnan thinks Oppenheimer star Cillian Murphy would "do a magnificent job" playing 007.
Brosnan, who portrayed the famous spy in four films from 1995 to 2002, gave hi… [+1684 chars]
